column4: BRIEF-Vodafone India arm ties up with Microsoft as cloud service partner
column5: * VBS ties up with Microsoft as cloud service partner; offering office 365 business suite as part of its cloud applications portfolio  Source text:  Vodafone Business Services (VBS)  the enterprise arm of Vodafone India  has tied up with Microsoft as a Cloud Service Partner. As part of this tie-up  VBS to offer Office 365 to Indian businesses to give them enterprise-grade productivity and collaboration services.
